greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of non-congruent solutions to x^2 == 2 mod n.
link: Eric M. Schmidt, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Multiplicative with a(p^m) = 2 for p == 1, 7 (mod 8); a(p^m) = 0 for p == 3, 5 (mod 8); a(2^1) = 1; a(2^m) = 0 for m > 1. - _Eric M. Schmidt_, Apr 20 2013
mathematica: f[2, e_] := Boole[e == 1]; f[p_, e_] := If[MemberQ[{1, 7}, Mod[p, 8]], 2, 0]; a[1] = 1; a[n_] := Times @@ f @@@ FactorInteger[n]; Array[a, 100] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Sep 19 2020 *)
results.author: Yuval Dekel (dekelyuval(AT)hotmail.com), Oct 06 2003
